description.name: Will be visible to other users

validation.password-min-length: Password must be at least 8 characters

notification.success-sign-up: I just sent an email to {{email}}. Please click on the link in the mail to confirm your account.
notification.success-resend-validation-email: A new email has been send to {{email}}
notification.success-reset-password-sent-email: An email as successfully been sent to reset your password
notification.success-new-password: Your password has been successfully updated
notification.success-level-saved: Your level has been successfully saved
notification.success-level-published: Your level has been successfully published
notification.success-level-unpublished: Your level has been successfully unpublished
notification.success-level-deleted: Your level has been successfully deleted
notification.success-level-thumbnail-uploaded: Your level thumbnail has been successfully uploaded
notification.error-user-name-taken: This username already exists. Please choose another name
notification.error-level-name-taken: This level name already exists. Please choose another name
notification.error-level-name-too-long: This level name is too long
notification.error-unknown: An unknown error occurred, please try again later

error-bad-request.email: Email must be a valid email

notification.error-missing-level-name: Please enter a name for your level
notification.error-level-thumbnail-upload: Your thumbnail has not been uploaded

before-publish-confirmation.title: Level validation process
before-publish-confirmation.description: In order to publish your level, you need to proof that the level is finishable. Please play it from start to finish and make sure it's possible to complete it.

after-publish-confirmation.title: Level validation process successful
after-publish-confirmation.subtitle: Congratulations, you fulfilled the validation process for your level!
after-publish-confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to publish the level "{{levelName}}"? Once published, the level will be visible to everyone and you won't be able to edit it anymore.

forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.description: Give me your email address and I will send you a link to reset your password.

sign-up-email-validation.title: Account validation required
sign-up-email-validation.description: I need you to validate your email address. Please click on the link in the mail I just sent you.
sign-up-email-validation.no-received-email: Didn't receive the email we previously sent you?

sign-up-email-activated.title: Email activated!
sign-up-email-activated.description: Congratulations, your email has been activated. You can now login.

delete-confirmation.title: Delete level
delete-confirmation.description: Are you sure you want to delete the level "{{levelName}}"? This operation cannot be undone.
